txt.en:
'Ha! Fool! That's the wrong token! I should have known you were no lore-master! Oh, wait. That's the right one, isn't it?

'Bah! Just luck! Beginner's luck! Fool's luck! I won't tell you my dreadful secret at all now!

'Well, not that Humfrey Rumming has a dreadful secret, you know; it's just that if I did, I wouldn't tell you. You see? You see?'
'Ha! I knew you would fail!'
Rumming's Ridiculous Request
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! You are not worthy to share TBD's knowledge. Ha ha ha!'
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! You are not worthy to share TBD's knowledge. Ha ha ha!'
Collected Token of the Bat
'Can't figure it out? You're not a lore-master at all, are you. Ha! Look for the box that solves my riddle -- I've hidden them all over Tyl Ruinen!'
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! You are not worthy to share TBD's knowledge. Ha ha ha!'
The key breaks in your hand
'Humfrey Rumming? A lore-master? I have never heard the name. Perhaps you can learn what he knows? Return to Tyl Ruinen and attempt to solve his riddle, no matter how ridiculous it may seem.'
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! You are not worthy to share TBD's knowledge. Ha ha ha!'
The key breaks in your hand
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! You are not worthy to share TBD's knowledge. Ha ha ha!'
The key breaks in your hand

Humfrey Rumming is by the ruins of Tollobel on Tyl Ruinen.\n\nYou have obtained the token of the bat from a chest on Tyl Ruinen. Bring it back to Humfrey Rumming if you believe it is the solution to his riddle.
'Ha! Wrong! That's the wrong token! Fool! Oh, wait. Sorry. That's the right one, isn't it. Bah. Just luck! That's what it was, just luck!'
The key breaks in your hand

Solve Humfrey Rumming's riddle
Bring token of the bat to Humfrey Rumming
The key breaks in your hand

The lore-master Humfrey Rumming must know something about the salamanders of Tyl Ruinen, but he seems to be hiding some sort of secret. There must be some way to get him to tell what he knows.
